channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Less than a week to save $300+ on TechCrunch All Stage passes
item.description: The premiere founder conference brought to you by TechCrunch is heading back to Boston on July 15. TC All Stage 2025 (formerly known as Early Stage) i...

item.title: 85 Best Amazon Spring Sale Deals (2025)
item.description: Now’s your chance to save on our favorite WIRED-tested home and tech gadgets.

item.title: Apple Music is integrating with music tools to allow DJs to create mixes using its catalog
item.description: Apple said today it is opening up its catalog to let users build mix sets by integrating the platform with a number of tools. These tools include Algo...

item.title: Inside Silicon Valley’s Invite-Only IRL Dating Scene
item.description: The San Francisco Bay Area is awash with in-person dating meetups for tech workers, where attendees are vetted before entry.

item.title: RISC Architecture Really Did Change Everything
item.description: “RISC architecture is gonna change everything.” Those absurdly geeky, incredibly prophetic words were spoken 30 years ago. Today, they’re somehow true...

item.title: Outreach founder Manny Medina has a new startup that helps AI agents get paid
item.description: Medina's new startup, called Paid, helps agentic startups profitably charge for their bots.

item.title: Plural’s platform allows enterprises to manage their Kubernetes clusters in one place
item.description: When Sam Weaver was vice president of product management at Unqork, he realized that the company needed a better way to manage its sprawling network o...

item.title: Tesla Superchargers: GM, Ford, Rivian, and other EV brands with access
item.description: EV owners of GM vehicles like the Chevrolet Silverado EV and Cadillac Lyriq will now officially have access to Tesla’s Superchargers.

item.title: ‘Over 1 Million’ People Wanted a Cybertruck. Where Are They?
item.description: “Demand is off the charts!” Elon Musk crowed at the end of 2023, citing more than a million reservations for Tesla's polarizing polygonic pickup—so wh...

item.title: Lenovo ThinkPad X9 14 Aura Edition Review: No More TrackPoint
item.description: Lenovo finally ditches the iconic little red nubbin on this ThinkPad, which raises the question: Is it still a ThinkPad?
